hero.description: We are a community of believers dedicated to serving God and our neighbors. Join us this Sunday as we worship together.

location.text: We are located in the heart of the city, easily accessible by public transport. Parking is available.

coreValues.title: Love God
coreValues.description: We believe in loving God with all our heart, soul, and mind through worship and obedience.

coreValues.title: Love People
coreValues.description: We are committed to loving our neighbors as ourselves and serving our community.

coreValues.title: Make Disciples
coreValues.description: We are dedicated to sharing the Gospel and helping others grow in their faith journey.

events.title: Prayer Meeting
events.description: Join us for worship and prayer.

footerText: A place of worship, community, and growth. Join us as we journey together in faith and serve our community with love.
